# Pinot Noir
## Rundown
- Big 4
    - Medium Body
    - Medium-High Fruit
        - Very red-fruited (cherry and cranberry) often with appealing vegetable notes of beets or mushrooms
    - Medium to Low Tannins
    - Medium-High Acidity
- Subgroups

        - Carneros
